revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Year 17. List of net (?) revenues (or: 'list of Philon, of revenues'): dr. 76 (ex 96); of which were expended for the price of wine on the 4th for 3 4-chous jars 27 drachmas; likewise, on the 5th for 2 4-chous jars 18 dr., for the conveyance 1 ob., for top( ) 4 ob., makes 18 dr., 5 ob. On the 6th, for 4 4-chous jars 36 dr., for their conveyance 2 ob., for top( ) 6 ob., makes 37 drachmas, 1 ob., of which for --- 18 dr., for other expenditures 9 dr., for other expenditures for/to Kastor 4 dr., makes 31 dr., leaves (?) 6 dr., 1 ob.

listBibl.bibl: Worp, K. A. - Nielsen, B. "New Papyri from the New York University Collection: IV". ZPE 149 (2004) 123-4 (Nr. 53) Lionel Casson, NYU Dissertation, 18-22, 1939
